guide: For this you will need Combat 15.
To blow up crypts you can use
class abilities (Tank, Archer, Mage)
and/or Superboom TNTs that drop
from slaying Minibosses in dungeons
and can be bought from Walther in
The Deep Caverns or Ophelia in
The Dungeon Hub.
To get easy progress in this do
contests like Wheat, Potato
or Carrot as those are easy
Bronze or Silver Medals to get.
You can also try to utilize pests to help here.
To gain passively progress in this
you should have a pet equipped at all times.
Don't forget to use pet items that boost
their XP-gain. Things like Milestone Rewards
(Commission, Garden, Bestiary Milestones)
and Pet Candies will be a good help here.
Mine normal or Pure Ores in the Dwarven Mines.
You might want to use HotM perks that reward
Mining Speed/Spread aswell as armor, pet and
tools that do so.
For this you can participate in Arachne fights
in the Spiders Den, salvage Arachne/Spider Gear
or collect secrets in dungeons.
Use the wiki to figure out what Fetchur asks for.
You will need to get into Dwarven Mines to be
able to even talk to him.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
Do your daily Experimentation Tables
after getting Enchanting Level 10.
Unlock Clay Minions by fishing in the
Backwater Bayou (Fishing 5). Then use the Clay Trade
to get enough Clay for minions.
Give them the best fuel and storage you
have access to. Using Compactors is strongly
recommended. Remember to collect in time.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Costs 256 Enchanted Oak Wood to craft and
unlocks at Oak Wood Collection 9 (30k).
You should also consider getting gear from
Galatea like Canopy Armor (requires 1.21.5
to enter that island)
Kill Sheeps in the Desert Island (/warp desert)
place as many Sheep Minions as you can and
give them the best fuel and storage you have
access to. Remember to collect them in time.

note: Kill a t2 Slayer Boss under 80s
guide: Recommended for this either Revenant Horror II
or Tarantula Broodfather II. Use your Ender Armor
and Void Sword (200k) for this.
Kill Sneaky Creepers in the Deep Caverns.
§cFor this you can't have an Intimidation Talisman
§cactive or you won't see the Creepers!
Place as many Creeper Minions as you can and
give them the best fuel and storage you have
access to. Remember to collect them in time.
§cYou want the Intimidation Talisman active
§con your island when you have Creeper Minions,
§celse they will blow it up.
List of more than 30 talismans:
Buy all 6 Talismans from the Adventurer in The Hub (26k)
Collection Talismans:
Farming Talisman, Vaccine Talisman,
Gravity Talisman, Talisman of Coins, Magnetic Talisman,
Wood Affinity Talisman, Speed Talisman, Potion Affinity Talisman,
Small Fish Bowl, Pressure Talisman, Talisman of Power,
Haste Ring, Emerald Ring
Others:
Archaeologists Compass, Shiny Yellow Rock, King Talisman,
Campfire Initiate Badge, Cat Talisman, Spider Talisman,
Soul Campfire Initiate Badge, Runeblade Talisman,
Moonglade Talisman, New Year Cake Bag, Candy Talisman,
Pig's Foot, Wolf Paw, Pesthunter Talisman
Don't forget to take the 4 Bonus accessory bag slots from
the Redstone Miner, he needs 1920 Redstone in total.
This unlocks at 2.5k Raw Porkchop Collection
and requires 40 Enchanted Pork to make.
You can use Minions for this and/or pair
it with the Exterminator Grind if you do
that in Barn.
For this you'll need an End Stone Geode
which only drops from End Stone Nodes (1.42%)
in The End. You'll need Combat 12 to go there.
To make your journey safer, buy a Stonk (600k)
to prevent Nested Endermites to spawn and to make
the Geode Drop more likely.
Apply it to any Armor Piece once you got Mining 14+.

note: Obtain a Bronze or higher medal from Jacobs Contest
guide: Do contests like Wheat, Potato or Carrot.
You can also try to utilize pests to help here.
Brew a potion with an Enchanted Sugar Cane/
Enchanted Gold (Block)/Enchanted Sugar (Cane)
and add Glowstone to it. You can get that Glowstone
by buying one block from the Builder and
breaking it on your island.
For this you'll want to use the Spider Hat
as it costs 95 Spider Essence and 35k coins
to apply 5 Stars to it. Use Mort in
The Dungeon Hub or Hub to apply them.
You can visit all Islands by using warp commands.
The Hub, Spider's Den, The End,
Gold Mine, Deep Caverns,
Farming Isles. Remember that some of them
require certain skill levels to enter.

note: Obtain a Mediocre Ring of Love
guide: Follow the Romero Questline until you
get this. You will only need
1 Yellow Rock, 15 poppies and 64 Emerald.
Ways to obtain:
Craft (Lapis Lazuli Collection 5),
a drop from fishing,
from the Experimentation Table,
drop from Ender Nodes in the End (11-13%).
Recommended for this are:
Bingo, Rock, Grandma Wolf,
Pig, Enderman, Horse, Jerry,
Chicken, Silverfish.
Some of them require certain
collections and materials to craft.
